name: Angler
description:
Help the anglerfish seek out and catch its prey, navigating undersea tunnels and avoiding dangers.

Controls:

Arrow Keys/WASD - Move
Esc - Pause
Enter - Unpause

Credits:

Programming - IJZM
Pixel Art - Takeshi64
Music/SFX - Random-StoryKeeper
Game Design - TinyCastleGuy

Made in 9 days for the GB Jam 5

http://ijzm.github.io/
